data.eml:eml: New taxonomic data on the genus Ypsolopha Latreille (Lepidoptera, Ypsolophidae) with descriptions of two new species from the Russian Far East

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ponomarenko, Margarita G., Zinchenko, Yuliya N. (2013): New taxonomic data on the genus Ypsolopha Latreille (Lepidoptera, Ypsolophidae) with descriptions of two new species from the Russian Far East. ZooKeys 289: 25-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.3905, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.3905
